alert.note: Alert for Mercer (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 04 at 9:09PM CDT until August 05 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT SATURDAY FOR MERCER COUNTY... At 909 PM CDT, the transportation department reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Flash flooding occurring on Route P near Adel. Between 2 and 4.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Transportation department reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Princeton, Mercer, South Lineville, Mill Grove and Modena. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
